definitions.title: n.[m.] coll.
definitions.body: ornaments (with which one is decked);—´[[ע]] abs. Is 49:18, [[עֶָדי]] Ez Eze 16:11, Eze 23:40; cstr. 2Sa 1:24 +; sf. [[עֶדְיוֹ]] Ex 33:4 +, [[עֶדְיְְ]] Ex 33:5, etc.;—ornaments:

of women 2Sa 1:24 ([[זׇהָב]] ´[[ע]]), Je 2:32; of Jerus. under fig. of woman Je 4:30 ([[זׇהָב]] ´[[ע]]), Ez Eze 16:11, Eze 23:40 (all acc. cogn. c [[עָדָה]]), Is 49:18 (sim.).—[[עֲדִי עֲדָיִים]] Ez Eze 16:7, rd. prob. [[עַד עִדִּים]] unto menstruation (maturity), JDMich Co Berthol (rdg. ´[[בְּעֵת עִדּ]]), Toy. [[עֶדְיֵךְ]] Ps 103:5 [sf. ref. to [[נַפְשִׁי]]] is dub., LXX t. e)piqumi/an sou [rdg. [[אַוׇּתֵךְ]] ? this usu. c. [[נֶפֶשׁ]]]; thine age, prime (cf.

definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: [[עַד]]) JDMich; Thes; conject. in Hup-Now Che Du.
in gen., as feeding pride Ez Eze 7:20 ([[חְבִי עֶדְיוֹ]], sf. ref. to silver and gold, v:Eze 7:19)
trappings of horse Ps 32:9 (De Hup, cf. Du), si versa l., but prob, corrupt; Che (after v. Ortenb.) [[לִבְלָּם עַד יוּבַל אֵלֶיְ]] must be curbed till he can be brought, etc.
